65697.summary: Some customers in the McKinley & Ellison Lake areas of McKinley Landing are experiencing an interruption to Internet, Television and Home Phone services. We are working to restore service as quickly as possible and apologize for any inconvenience this may cause.
65697.title: Aug 18 - McKinley Landing (McKinley & Ellison Lake) | All Services - Outage (Fix In Progress)

live_updates: Power has been restored, and services are back online for most customers. Technicians continue to restore services for a few remaining areas.

Teams have confirmed a power outage is present in the area affecting our equipment. Please refer to your local power company for any updates. Once power is restored, services in the area should begin working. Our next update will be after the power is restored. Thank you for your patience.
We're looking into it. Stay tuned for updates.
